constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 215 (Tuesday, December 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KELLY of Illinois:
H.R. 6268.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of Section 8 Article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H7824]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

policyArea.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

title: Protect Black Women and Girls Act of 2021
